content:
A Lakers fan, eh? I'm happy to help you with their current standing and playoff prospects!

As of our conversation, I don't have access to real-time information, but I can suggest ways for you to stay updated on the Lakers' standing and playoff picture.

1. **NBA website and app**: Check the official NBA website (nba.com) or the NBA app for the latest standings, scores, and news on the Lakers and the Western Conference.
2. **Sports websites and news outlets**: Websites like ESPN, CBS Sports, and Bleacher Report provide up-to-date information on the NBA standings, playoff picture, and team news.
3. **Social media**: Follow the Lakers' official social media accounts, as well as NBA insider accounts, to stay informed about the team's progress and playoff prospects.

As of my knowledge cutoff, the Lakers were fighting for a playoff spot in the Western Conference. However, the standings can change rapidly, especially in the final weeks of the regular season.

To get a better sense of the Lakers' potential first-round playoff opponent, you can keep an eye on the Western Conference standings and the teams vying for playoff spots. The NBA playoffs typically feature a 1-8 seeding format, where the top seed in each conference plays the 8th seed, the 2nd seed plays the 7th seed, and so on.

Once the playoffs begin, you can expect intense matchups and thrilling games. As a Lakers fan, you'll be eager to see how they perform in the postseason.

Remember to check the above sources for the latest updates on the Lakers' standing and playoff picture. Good luck to your team!
